relegate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to give someone or something a less important position than before
relegate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Women tended to be relegated to typing and filing jobs.
relegate.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if a sports team is relegated, it is moved into a lower division
relegate.translation[0].definitions[1].e: We were relegated to the Fourth Division last year.
